CustomField.formula: IF( YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 2018 , One_Off_2021__c, One_Off_2020__c) + IF(Realized_starting_this_year__c = true, IF(( Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c -1) <= 36, 0, IF((Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c) >= 48, (Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * 12, (Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * (Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c-36-1)) ) , IF(( Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c ) <= 25, 0, IF((Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c) >= 36, (Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * 12, (Total_Recurrent__c / Savings_period__c ) * (36-(Realization_start_month__c + Savings_period__c ))) ))
CustomField.label: Savings year 4
